resources.string: Unknown error: are sure the app is installed?
A reminder to check your filtered notification at your desired time.
You have filtered notifications you haven\'t checked
Tap to set a new time
Notify me to check filtered notifications daily
Looks like you are stuck in an infinite scrolling.
One of the ways apps compete for your time and attention is through colors, using grayscale Farhan can disable colors for selected apps when you lunch them eliminating their effect on you!
This service is required for functionalities like infinite scroll blocker or screen grayscale to work
Farhan needs usage access to display your usage information
Appear on top permission is not granted :(
Farhan needs Appear on top access to help you break Infinite scrolling
Farhan needs accessibility service to be able to:

Infinite scrolling is a technique used by apps to keep giving you new content no matter how much you scroll thus reducing your control over your time, Farhan can try to detect when you are stuck in an infinite scroll and remind you to get out of that app!

Notifications are like an alarm except that they can distract you at any time without you even knowing when, Farhan can eliminate this distraction by filtering notification so you won\’t be distracted, you can exclude important apps that you want to get notifications from and the rest will get filtered and you can come to the app and see them at any time!
Farhan needs notification access for Notification filter to work
Farhan does not connect to the internet in anyway, in fact it does\'nt even have an internet permission, so your data stays on your phone
Anyone can see how Farhan works by viewing the source code on GitHub
Let your phone work for you, Not the other way around!

Farhan is an open source android project that offers different tools for you to help you lower the effect of apps manipulating strategies that are used to drain your time and attention, so you can use your phone but not the other way around!
Secure settings permission is not granted :(
Farhan needs Secure settings permission to grayscale the screen for you
Looks like your device is rooted!, use the button below if you want to grant the permission with root
Farhan needs accessibility service to be able to:
To Grant this permission you will need a PC, don\'t worry you only have to do it once and it only takes a few minutes
Please select Farhan to set it as your default launcher
Please select the other launcher you want to use
Know if current app is in exceptions list or not
Know How much you scroll and how much items are on screen.
Display a message if we detect infinite scrolling.
Know if current app is in whitelist or not

string-array.name: tips
string-array.item: To improve productivity during work hours switch your phone to silent and keep it out of sight (Ex: in a drawer)
Don\'t want to miss a notification from an app? make sure to exclude that app in notification filter
When Grayscale is on, only whitelisted apps will be grayscaled
Infinite scroll blocker is experimental if you are facing a problem with an app you can add it to exceptions to avoid false detections
Use notify me in notifications filter and set a time to be notified to check your filtered notifications daily
This is a beta version of Farhan, make sure to report any bugs to the developer and take screenshots if possible

resources.string: You can add exceptions or set a reminder from notification filter settings
Welcome to notifications filter, your filtered notifications will apear here!.
